name: A Cool Adventure Hunter The Duck Shoot-ing Game By Free Animal-s Hunt-ing & Fish-ing Games For Adult-s Teen-s & Boy-s Pro
name_original: A Cool Adventure Hunter The Duck Shoot-ing Game By Free Animal-s Hunt-ing & Fish-ing Games For Adult-s Teen-s & Boy-s Pro
description:
DOWNLOAD NOW!!!!

Aim & Shoot! Shoot the ducks and become a Master Hunter. Tilt the device to aim and Tap to shoot and kill.

- EASY CONTROLS (Tap to shoot)
- Awesome Graphics
- Multiple TARGETS!
- Improve your skills and accomplish EXTREME HUNTING MISSIONS
- Compete against your friends

Don't miss a single Shot....or you will end up losing the game!

Download now and don't miss amazing updates!
